mapper.update:
update employee
emp_id = #{empId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
emp_number = #{empNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
emp_name = #{empName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
emp_org_id = #{empOrgId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
emp_district_id = #{empDistrictId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
emp_login_name = #{empLoginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
emp_password = #{empPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
emp_email = #{empEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
emp_phone = #{empPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
emp_mobile = #{empMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
emp_address = #{empAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
emp_type = #{empType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
emp_management_dist_id = #{empManagementDistId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
emp_role_id = #{empRoleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
emp_login_ip = #{empLoginIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=BIGINT},
useable = #{useable,jdbcType=BIT},
remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=CHAR}

update employee set emp_number = #{empNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, emp_name = #{empName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, emp_org_id = #{empOrgId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, emp_district_id = #{empDistrictId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, emp_login_name = #{empLoginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, emp_password = #{empPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, emp_email = #{empEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, emp_phone = #{empPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, emp_mobile = #{empMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, emp_address = #{empAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, emp_type = #{empType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, emp_management_dist_id = #{empManagementDistId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, emp_role_id = #{empRoleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, emp_login_ip = #{empLoginIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, emp_login_date = #{empLoginDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, emp_login_flag = #{empLoginFlag,jdbcType=BIT}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, useable = #{useable,jdbcType=BIT}, remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where emp_id = #{empId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM employee WHERE emp_login_name = #{empLoginName} AND useable = 1

select
from employee where emp_login_name = #{empLoginName} and emp_password = #{empPassword} and useable = 1

SELECT
FROM employee WHERE useable = 1
AND emp_number LIKE CONCAT('%', #{empNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
AND emp_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{empName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
AND emp_org_id LIKE CONCAT('%', #{empOrgId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, '%')
AND emp_district_id LIKE CONCAT('%', #{empDistrictId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, '%')
AND emp_login_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{empLoginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
AND emp_phone LIKE CONCAT('%', #{empPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
AND emp_mobile LIKE CONCAT('%', #{empMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
AND emp_type LIKE CONCAT('%', #{empType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
AND emp_role_id LIKE CONCAT('%', #{empRoleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
